biotools.summary: AltAnalyze is a comprehensive tool for the analysis of gene expression and alternative splicing data from RNA-seq and Affymetrix (exon, gene, junction) datasets at the level of proteins, domains, microRNA binding sites and pathways. The Cytoscape plugin DomainGraph (www.domaingraph.de) allows for visualization of AltAnalyze results at multiple levels of abstraction (e.g., isoform, exon, protein, domain, molecular interactions).
